description: Oscar removes Sean's harness and collar. He puts a headharness with a large rubber ballgag on Sean's head and buckles it tight. He gets a chair and pulls Sean over his lap, removing the electric bullet. He spanks Sean, who grunts with pain and drools around the ball gag. The spanking goes on and on, turning Sean's ass bright red. With leather restraints on his ankles and wrists, Sean is tied to a wall, rope around his midsection holding him tightly against it. His wrists are attached to a pulley device and pulled taut over his head, his legs are spread wide. Oscar applies an endless number of multicolored tiny clamps and regular-sized clothespins to Sean's scrotum, belly area, chest, collarbone area and upper arms. Oscar flicks the clamps and pins with his fingers, plays a vibrator against them, pushes at the skin around them. This goes on for quite a while, the boy's face a mask of pain. Once he has tired of playing, Oscar starts removing the pinching devices, announcing in advance that it will hurt. All the clamps and pins leave angry red bites. The boy takes it stoically, but is close to tears, especially when the last ones are removed from his scrotum. Oscar rubs the welts, which makes Sean wince, and kisses Sean over his gag.
title: Boysitting: Spanked and Pinned
